article_title: How To Reduce Your Health Insurance Premiums And Avoid Penalties

article_metadata.description: Avoiding the Obamacare penalties and determining if you qualify for a premium subsidy are two of the most important issues on the minds of Americans. Get all the facts before you enroll.
article_metadata.author: Mike Patton
